detailsOfAchievement: Vision A Just, enlightened, healthy and democratic Bundelkhand & Trible area free from hunger, poverty, environmental degradation and all forms of exploitation based on age, sex ,religion and ethnicity. Mission PRAGATI works with people whose lives are dominated by extreme poverty, illiteracy, disease and other handicaps. With multifaceted development interventions, PRAGATI strives to bring about positive change in the quality of life of the poor people of BUNDELKHAND region of UP and MP. Major Activity of organisation is 1.Water and sanitation project are implemented with community support . 2.Advance agriculture practice support to poor farmers & woman farmers through Farmers Interest Groups FIG and SHGs. 3. ENVIRONMENT & HYGEINE PROMOSION ACTIVITY Running with Rural Community Support and School Children. 4. Plantation promossion . 5. Agro foresty activity promosion and Trainng to unemployed rural youth . 6. safe drinking & Water recharging Activity implement in remote & rural Area . 7. Animal Welafre & Awarness activity . 8. promosion Non Formal Education in Rural Area. 9. We are organised Medical Camps in Remote & Rural Area. 10. HIV/ AIDS awarness promosion activity in High Risk Area.

detailsOfAchievement: Pragati Rath is a non-profit making registered organization (society) having 12A & 80G registeration,working in Jhansi (U.P.) and Tikamgarh (M.P.) districts of Bundelkhand region, which is among the most backward areas of India. We are working here in 8 villages and other backward colonies of Jhansi (most of whom are tribal villages) on education, health, women empowerment, skill development, providing vocational trainings, liaison â€“ connecting people to government schemes, income generation programs, social awareness generation, etc. In all the 8 villages our Free Non-Formal Education Centers and Stitching Centers are going on. We give various types of free trainings as computer literacy, fashion jewellary making, stitching, incense stick & candle making, mehndi and envelope making, etc. to help people become economically self dependent. We are running a Fashion Jewellary Making unit at District Jail, Jhansi where lady prisoners make jewellary.

title: Pragnarain Mook BadhirVidyalaya
detailsOfAchievement: Established in 1968,the Pragnarain in Mook Vidyalaya, began with humble beginnings, based on free imparting of primary education through lip-reading methods. No fees were charged,with and this still continues. From 1975 the Government of India began giving the society an annual grant which enabled the school greatly to increase its enrolment and employ larger staff. The Government also kindly gave our Society a building grant of Rs 13.50 lakh,which enable the School to add second storey and enlarge the ground storey of the school building,in 2001. We cater to deaf children in Aligarh city,which has the population of over a million.Currently,we have 107 pupils and teach up to class VIII through 9 teachers/instructors. Last year all the ten children in Class VIII passed the Middle School examination of Basic Education Board. We also provide computer-training to help our pupils in getting better employment. teach tailoring and embroidery to girls and binding to the boys for the same purpose. We have done our best to get as many deaf children educated as possible, paying special attention to girls who number 50 (fifty) in our present enrolment,while 21 belong to the Scheduled Castes. We have also a good proportion of minority children. We are proud that the bulk of our children come from the poorer strata
